actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to compensate U.S. salmon fishing vessel owners and operators, salmon processors, and employees of such owners, operators and processors, for certain losses incurred as a result of salmon fishing by foreign fishing vessels under the terms of the International Convention for the High Seas Fisheries of the North Pacific Ocean.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to compensate United States salmon fishing vessel owners and operators, salmon processors, and employees of such owners, operators, and processors, for losses incurred as a result of salmon fishing by foreign fishing vessels under the terms of the International Convention for the High Seas Fisheries of the North Pacific Ocean. Authorizes an appropriation of $14,500,000 to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to compensate U.S. salmon fishing vessel owners and operators, salmon processors, and employees of such owners, operators and processors, for certain losses incurred as a result of salmon fishing by foreign fishing vessels under the terms of the International Convention for the High Seas Fisheries of the North Pacific Ocean.
